name: unwaged
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without pay or without a paid job: The children described long hours of unwaged work. Since I'm unwaged, I don't have a credit card.
More examplesFewer examplesThe cost is £25, or £15 for unwaged students. Vast sections of theatre and, increasingly, film and television are unwaged.These unwaged people are often more or less cut off from the market economy.
